reviews.text_excerpt:
I was here last night with my husband.

After a long wait we finally got a reservation at Per Se. We heard so many awesome things about theThomas Keller...
From all the good ratings, comes another good rating for Per Se. Worth the time and money. I am at ease at this place. Great.
I came here most recently for my birthday. The service was, as expected, of the highest caliber--staff were extremely attentive to detail, whisking away...

Oh, Eleven Madison Park, how I love you!

I was lucky enough to visit EMP for the first time about two years ago, before the James Beard Award, before they...
This was a fantastic dining experience on all levels. EMP is well deserving of its three Michelin stars and is one of the few restaurants in the world that...
Everything was perfect- food, service and the facility. One of my top 5 restaurants in NYC. I had the hot foie gros, broccoli, Muscovy duck and chocolate...

reviews.text_excerpt: I am glad that I chose Jean George to end my NYC dining experience this year.  I am impressed mostly by the service.  Unlike other Michelin 3 stars...
Don't get me wrong...the food here is very good.  But for a Michelin 3-Star restaurant where I am spending hundreds of dollars per person, I expect more...

After a 2 year hiatus, I came back to visit NYC, and no trip is complete without a fine dining trip to Jean-Georges.

The menu had completely changed, the...

reviews.text_excerpt: Absolutely delicious ! Loved every bite I had. We were a bit nervous at first because we had heard mixed reviews. But when we sat down we were extremely...

Sometimes when you go for Michelin's lunch, it is not uncommon to say "meh, that was a different thing from what I had in dinner".

But here, you are...
The finest in fine dining.  The dishes go from excellent to outstanding.  The desserts are super exceptional.
I don;t know what I can add that hasn't already been said; but I'll try.  My wife & I chose Ai Fiori for our 5 year anniversary dinner after much debate....

I loved my first meal at this restaurant so decided to revisit here during RW lunch.

The food, except for the Skate wing which was way too heavily salt,...
This week was our 2nd "restaurant week" visit to this fine Italian restaurant. Our first was earlier in the year. Do no miss going to this fine dining...
